title: The Art Of Interpretation: A Guide To Remembering Rules Of Reality
description: Without awareness, there’s no choice and without choice, we’re forced to operate in whatever ways we’ve accepted as how things are “supposed to be”. In The Art of Interpretation: A Guide to Remembering Rules of Reality, Nima Khalilian describes fundamental concepts of reality and the mind’s power to manipulate it. This easy to understand guide serves as a reminder of the immense power, possessed by each and every one of us. With the awareness, each reader will have the choice of how to use their power to create the reality that serves them best.
author: Nima Khalilian
